ing: 2 (10.5 ounce) cans Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup
4 (14.5 ounce) cans Del MonteÂ® Green Beans, any style, drained
des: "Everything's better with baconâ€¦and cheese. Make you your favorite green bean casserole even better, just by adding these two ingredients. And no need to wait for a holiday to make this one Â– any day of the week will work!"
ins:
Stir the soup, milk and half the cheese, 5 tablespoons bacon, black pepper, beans and 1 1/3 cups onions in a 3-quart baking dish.
Bake at 350F for 25 minutes or until the bean mixture is hot and bubbling. Stir the bean mixture. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese, onions and bacon.
Bake for 5 minutes or until the onions are golden brown.
